description: Update an existing developer trucker certification classification
permissions: User must be authorized to update developer trucker certification classifications; access is delegated through the related developer.
side_effects: Updates the specified developer trucker certification classification.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one updatable field must be provided. name must be present and unique per developer.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: If provided, must be non-empty and unique within the developer.
